title: SIr Kled Bundle Non Refundable?
body: I bought the Sir kled RP bundle with RP, I have 2 remaining returns on the account but it says the bundle is non refundable, just wondering why that was. account name BeastsmurfBeast. thanks.

replies.body: The client currently doesn't support a refund for the bundle, but you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team will be happy to look into tihs and assist as long as you have any refund tokens.  We'll reply to your ticket asap!
